bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
If I inspect the output of 'dmesg | grep iwl' it shows 'Direct firmware load for iwlwifi-7260-17.ucode failed with error -2'
How reproducible:
Always.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Install iwl7260-firmware on a computer with the right wireless drive 2. Boot 3. Inspect dmesg
Actual results:
A failed line.
Expected results:
No failed line.
Additional info:
Downloading the blob from https://github.com/OpenELEC/iwlwifi-firmware/blob/0.0.5/firmware/iwlwifi-7260-17.ucode solves the error.
I'll update linux-firmware tomorrow. We can't use the blob from the OpenELEC repo, but it's in the upstream linux-firmware repo anyway.
